name: Somewhere in Time
overview: Coverdisk available on Amiga Fun #35. Also released on issue 2 of Amigo!. This is not an ordinary racing game: it requires you to build immense skill to make your way through all the obstacles. Every time you crash against an obstacle, you will lose a life. You have to steer a car to the exit of the level within a limited amount of time. There are multiple pathways and quite a lot of dead ends. You need to memorize the most efficient route and carefully drive without bumping into obstacles.
